sentences.en: After the brief ceremony there was a macabre wedding breakfast in the Fuehrer's private apartment.
sentences.cn: 在简短的仪式之后,在元首的居处摆下了阴森森的结婚早餐.

sentences.en: He takes a macabre interest in graveyards.
sentences.cn: 他那么留意墓地,令人毛骨悚然.

sentences.en: In such a macabre climax of degradation II Duce and Fascism passed into history.
sentences.cn: 意大利领袖和法西斯主义就是落得这样悲惨的可耻的下场而成为历史陈迹的.

sentences.en: Log on to the Hammer Web ring, with 12 more sites devoted to macabre movies.
sentences.cn: 登录哈默网络联盟，就会找到另外12个专门播放恐怖电影的网站。

sentences.en: Mr Dahl was well-known for his macabre adult stories called "Tales of the Unexpected".
sentences.cn: 达尔先生以成人恐怖小说集《意料之外的故事》闻名于世。

words.tran_cn: 可怕的；以死亡为主题的；令人毛骨悚然的（等于macaber）

trans.tran_cn: 可怕的，以死亡为主题的，令人毛骨悚然的
trans.tran_en: very strange and unpleasant and connected with death or with people being seriously hurt
